title: Police: Child accidentally shot himself in west Columbus
content:
COLUMBUS, Ohio - A 12-year-old boy is in stable condition after police said he accidentally shot himself in west Columbus.
Officers responded to the 600 block of Racine Avenue just after 6 p.m. Monday.
Police met with the victim who said he found a handgun in his grandfather’s bedroom and while handling the firearm, he accidentally shot himself one time in the leg.
The boy was taken to Nationwide Children's hospital.
The incident is still under investigation.
